document_data.name: Selara
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Selara''''' was a large boat from the town of [[Lonelywood]] in [[Icewind Dale]], in the late 13{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''Oh, yeah, I've been workin' on her for quite a spell. She'll be done in a while. Maybe then Young Ned can take you out on the lake. Do it myself, but my eyes aren't too good anymore.''|Thom Farold}}
document_data.Description: ''Selara'' was a sizable hand-built fishing boat that could fit up to seven [[humanoid]]s on board and safely transport them across the frigid [[Maer Dualdon]] lake.
document_data.History: ''Selara'' was built by [[Thom Farold]] of Lonelywood in the {{YearlinkName|1281}}. The boat was named after Selara, Thom's late wife and the boat would be used by Thom and his friend, [[Young Ned]], to [[fish]] in Maer Dualdon.
